Intro to Statistical and Data Sciences
Syllabus Problem Sets Resources

Resources

Your first stop for any help related to computing with data should be the book: Getting used to R, RStudio, and R Markdown.

R

  • Datacamp: Intro to R Course: online platform for learning the nuts and bolts of R.
  • swirl: Learn R, in R: an altervative interactive platform for learning R.

R Markdown

  • Prezi on Reproducible Research through R Markdown
  • YouTube video on using R Markdown with RStudio
  • R Markdown debugging reference sheet

Data Science

  • R for Data Science by Grolemund and Wickham
  • The Elements of Data Analytic Style by Leek

Albert Y. Kim's Webpage
